articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: The new Dolby Vision 2 HDR standard is probably going to be controversial - Ars Technica
articles.description: It addresses two scourges of modern TV viewing—but maybe not in the way we want.

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Amazon launches Lens Live, an AI-powered shopping tool for use in the real world - TechCrunch
articles.description: Lens Live will not replace Amazon's existing visual search tool, Amazon Lens, which lets you take a picture, upload an image, or scan a barcode to discover products. Instead, it brings a real-time component to Amazon Lens.
articles.content: Amazon is further investing in AI-powered shopping experiences with Tuesday’s launch of Lens Live, a new AI-powered upgrade to its Amazon Lens shopping feature that allows consumers to discover new p… [+2239 chars]
